text:
Some of country music’s finest stopped by Jimmy Kimmel Live for a very special edition of the popular Mean Tweets segment that aired Wednesday night.

While some of the tweets poked fun at names — “When Cassadee pope goes to the bathroom her name is Cassadee poop” — others took digs at the music. “I just heard a Darius Rucker country song, and I hate to be dramatic, but it’s the worst thing that’s ever happened to me,” one person tweeted. “The worst!?” the Grammy-winning singer responded, laughing.

The segment aired to coincide with the CMA Awards, and also included Chris Young reading a tweet criticizing his new album. “Some say I should just ignore what I think sucks, so today I’m ignoring Chris Young’s new album.” Meanwhile, Chris Stapleton was criticized for his looks, and Little Big Town got their feelings hurt: “Little Big Town sounds like they threw a bunch of cats in a bag and beat them around with a tennis racquet.”

Watch the full video — which also includes Zac Brown Band, Blake Shelton, Luke Combs, Randy Houser, Trace Adkins, Florida Georgia Line, Old Dominion, Dan+Shay, Jana Kramer, Chris Young, Lady Antebellum, Jake Owen, and Justin Moore — above.
title: Watch Blake Shelton, Little Big Town, and more country stars read Mean Tweets
